msbt.message: Welcometo my palace!I've filled it full of all the things that make me H-A-P-P-Y HAPPY!Feel free to look at all my fab stuff and validate my life choices!

<20_2 arg="10" />My <20_3 arg="3" /> is the comfiest thing EVER!<20_3 arg="6" />I like to lay on it while I read Fauna Magazine or Ms. Nintendique. It's SO comfy that sometimes I fall asleepAnd wake up with magazines stuck to my face!
I watch<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> a bunch of music shows so I can keep up with what's trending. But my TV's really here for<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /><10_10 />VIDEO GAMES!
I play my tunes <20_2 arg="10" />really, REALLY loud on my and totes lose myself in the music!<20_2 arg="6" />It's SO seriously the best!Until the neighbors complain.

I just CANNOT live with, you know, schedules! Or having to "be somewhere" at a "certain time."I mean, if I wanted STRUCTURE, I probs wouldn't be an aspiring pop star!Buuut I don't want to be late for dates with friends<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="10" />so I bought a chic li'l !
My ? Perfect for practicing having fans!You can talk to plants and say, "Oh! Thanks for being a fan!"I can even blow kisses to them and practice getting my targeting just right! Plants are the best.

I love doing some serious relaxing in my <20_2 arg="10" /> after dance practice!<20_3 arg="6" />Sometimes "dance practice" is just me running in circles for 30 minutes, burning off a sugar rushBut I still need a bath!
My<20_2 arg="10" /> is SO the best flat surface for writing you've ever seen!<20_3 arg="6" />I use it for practicing my autograph.
I'm kind of low-key picky about <20_2 arg="10" />my chairs<20_3 arg="6" />Mainly, they've got to look CUTE. The trendier, <20_3 arg="3" />the better! And if they're comfy? That's totes a bonus!

I want to start one of those world- famous bands. You know, the kind that're suuuper popular?So I'm maybe going to learn <20_2 arg="10" />to play the !I already—sometimes—practice singing, <20_3 arg="6" />so just imagine how FAB it'll be once I learn to play this thing.

Isn't my<20_2 arg="10" /> très fabuloso? YeahI'm kind of REALLY into cooking things lately.<20_3 arg="6" />Food. Mostly.I slapped out a stack of pancakes the other day? Whipped cream, fruit, syrup, peanut butterthe works!AndBONUS! Almost half of them weren't burned too badly!

Wondering how <20_2 arg="10" />my
looks in action?Ha! Me too! <20_3 arg="6" />Just putting it there felt like a job well done, so I haven't really used it, !

There's like six diff reality TV shows about pop stars living outdoors this season!I love the outdoors, but I don't know how to, uh, <20_2 arg="3" />use it? The outdoors, I mean. <20_2 arg="9" />So I bought this to study!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Don't you just love my ? <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I mean, it really sets the mood, doesn't it? I am ALLLLL about mood lighting. It really changes the vibe of a place, don't you think? Of course, no matter where I am, I want the vibe to be AWESOME, !

So, I'm totes going to let you in on a little secret. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you see this
This is where the magic happens! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What I mean is, THIS is where I go to create my look! We can all agree my look is 110 percent adorbs, right? And it all comes together right here! I won't tell you anything else about how I put together this fresh fash. The rest is my secret, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Here's the thing. I like to think of this as a kind of treasure chest, you know? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, it's full of all sorts of clothes and accessories that make me look like a million Bells! And what could I possibly treasure more than that, !
